title: Warlock
content:
Magic: Limited spells slots but always max level for Warlock's level. Regenerates on short rest as opposed to long rest. Works independently from spell slots of other classes. Eldritch Invocations Pact Boon Mystic Arcanum

BG3 Warlock Class Progression

Level 1 Pact Magic (Class Feature) Choose a Warlock Patron (The Fiend, The Great Old One, The Archfey or Hexblade) Choose 2 Cantrips from the Warlock Spell List. Choose 2 Spells from the Warlock Spell List. Level 2 Choose 2 Eldritch Invocations
